column2: "Mbrɛ sikakɔkɔɔ enyi edua ebisiw a! Mbrɛ sika mapa twann edua asakyer a! Krɔnkrɔnbea abo no woehue egugu abrɔn biara ne tsir."
"Zionmba a wɔsom bo a wɔdze hɔn to sika mapa ho no
column3: Mbrɛ woedua ebu hɔn dɛ dɛtse nsenaba

column2: "Nsɔ mpo wɔtwe enumfo
column3: wɔma hɔn mba wonum: naaso me man adan otsirmɔdzennyi

column2: "Akɔkowaba ne tɛkyerɛma fam n’anomu wɔ nsukɔm ntsi: Mbofra nkakraba bisa edziban
column3: naaso nyimpa biara mmbu bi mma hɔn."

column2: "Hɔn a wodzii adɔkɔdɔkɔdze ayeyɛ pasapasaa wɔ abrɔn mu: Hɔn a wɔnyɛɛn hɔn serdaa mu no wɔyɛ nsumina etuu."
"Na me man n’emumuyɛ ayɛ kɛse asen Sodom no bɔn
column4: a nnyɛ nsa biara na ɔyɛe."

column2: "N’ekunyin ho tsew sen esukwankyɛba
column3: wɔhoa sen enumfonsu. Hɔn honamenyi ber mu sen nankyenema

column2: "Afei dze hɔn enyim bir sen gyabiriw; wohu hɔn abrɔn mu a
column3: wonnhu hɔn: Hɔn honanwer femfam hɔn mbiew ho; ɔakyenkyen

column2: "Hɔn a wɔtotɔ afona ano no woye sen hɔn a ɔkɔm kuku hɔn; woyinom hɔn ahom apa
column4: wɔ haban mu nduadzewa a abɔ hɔn no ntsi."

column2: "Mbaa a wɔyɛ ehumbɔbɔr no hɔn nsa anoa hɔnankasa hɔn mba; wɔdaan hɔn edziban wɔ me man ne sɛɛe ntsi."
"EWURADZE ewie n’ebufuhyew fa
column3: oehue n’ebufuw dzendzen no egu; Na oekua ogya bi wɔ Zion a ɔamemen ne mfapem no."

column2: "Asaase do ahemfo anngye enndzi
column4: Dɛ ɔhohiahianyi na ɔtamfo bɛba abɛhɛn Jerusalɛm mbobokɛse mu."

column2: "No nkɔnhyɛfo hɔn bɔn
column3: na n’asɔfoe hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi a
column4: na wɔaka atseneneefo bɔgyaa egu wɔ ne finimfin."

column2: "Wɔkekaa dɛ enyifurafo wɔ abrɔn mu
column4: ma dɛm ntsi adasa nntum nnka hɔn ntar."

column2: "Wɔtseaa mu kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom a hom ho egu fi! Hom mfi hɔ
column6: mma hom mmfa hom nsa nnka biribiara: Aber a woguanee kekyinkyinii no
column7: adasa kae wɔ amanaman mu dɛ

column2: "EWURADZE n’ebufuw apaapaa hɔn mu; ɔnnkɛda ho ebu hɔn bi bio: woemmbu asɔfo no bi
column3: mpanyimfo no so ennya hɔn enyim enyimpa."

column2: "Hɛn enyiwa da ho bu dɛ ɔrohwɛ hɛn mboa kwan ara gyan: hɛn aweɔn mu yɛaweɔn ama ɔman bi a onnkotum nkwa gye."
"Wɔtwee hɛn anamɔn
column3: ma yenntum nnkɔ hɛn abrɔn mu: Hɛn ewiei abɛn
column4: hɛn nda aso; osiandɛ hɛn ewiei aba."

column2: "Hɛn etsiwfo hɔn ho yɛ har sen ɔsor nkɔr: Wotsiiw hɛn mbepɔw do
"Hɛn ahwentokura mu ahom
column4: wɔkyeer no wɔ hɔn amona mu; ɔno na yɛkae wɔ no ho dɛ
column5: No nwin ase na yebenya nkwa wɔ amanaman mu."

column2: "Edom babaa a etse Uz asaase do
column3: dzi ehurusi na ma w’enyi ngye: Kɔɔpow no botwa mu aba wo so wo hɔ; ebɔbow

column2: "Zion babaa
column3: w’emumuyɛ ho ntsea no aba ewiei. Ɔrennda ho nnsoa wo nnkɔ ndɔmmum mu: mbom
column5: obotua wo w’emumuyɛ ho kaw; ɔbɛda wo bɔn edzi."
